special_text:
Recipe [i](Exile this as it resolves with a cooking counter on it. Then you may put an “I”, “II”, and “III” ingredient you own in exile with cooking counters on them onto the battlefield merged as a Saga enchantment with their names, colors, and chapter abilities.)[/i]
[level 3] After the first postcombat main phase this turn, there’s an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. At the beginning of that combat, untap all creatures that attacked this turn.
notes: Changed art (the original art got used on a different card)
